hero.title: Worry-free rental income. Every month, under all circumstances.
hero.subtitle: Entrust your property to professionals and enjoy stable income without a single call from tenants. We take care of everything - from selecting reliable tenants to regular inspections and complete service. Your apartment. Our concern. Your peace of mind.

item1.text: We vet tenants, prepare contracts, ensure apartment handover, communication and billing. You don't worry about anything.

item2.title: Transparent contracts
item2.text: No asterisks or surprises. Contracts are clear, fair and straightforward.

item3.title: Fast response within 24 hours

item4.title: We maximize your profit

process.title: How does rental management work? Simply. In 4 steps.
process.subtitle: The entire process is fast, transparent, and designed for your maximum comfort.

step1.title: Non-binding consultation
step1.text: We discuss your property, goals and options - non-binding and free of charge.

step2.title: Tariff proposal and optimal rent
step2.text: We recommend the best tariff and set the rent to maximize your earnings.

step3.title: Signing a transparent contract
step3.text: A simple, fair and clear contract with no hidden conditions.

step4.title: You collect, we take care
step4.text: We handle everything from tenants to maintenance. You just watch the incoming payments.

benefits.title: What will we arrange for you?

tenants.title: Careful tenant selection
tenants.text: We check registries, income and references. We minimize the risk of non-payers and problematic tenants.

guarantee.title: Guaranteed income (for selected tariffs)
guarantee.text: With premium tariffs, you receive rent even when the apartment is empty or the tenant pays late.

management.title: Repair and technical maintenance coverage
management.text: We take care of all repairs, maintenance, inspections, communication with suppliers and annual billing.

legal.title: Complete legal and administrative service
legal.text: Professional lease agreements, handover protocols, communication with tenants, HOA and authorities - all on your behalf.

pricing.title: Our tariffs
pricing.subtitle: Our prices are transparent. No hidden fees, just a clearly defined percentage of monthly rent.

q1.question: What happens if a tenant doesn't pay?
q1.answer: With the START plan, we immediately initiate a standard debt collection process and communicate with the tenant. With the PREMIUM plan, you won't even notice this situation - we will send you the guaranteed rent from our own funds and handle the entire situation at our own expense.

q2.question: How does the tenant selection process work?
q2.answer: It is a multi-step process. We advertise on the largest portals, filter applicants, check them in available registries, verify their creditworthiness, and conduct personal interviews. We always consult with you on the final selection of the most suitable candidates.

q3.question: What if something needs to be repaired in the apartment?
q3.answer: Minor repairs (within the PREMIUM plan) are handled immediately with our vetted craftsmen. For larger repairs, we will contact you promptly, present the scope, budget, and after your approval, ensure complete implementation.

q4.question: What is the length of the management contract?
q4.answer: We typically sign the management contract for 12 months with automatic renewal and a clearly defined three-month notice period. We are flexible and can adjust the terms according to individual agreement.
